physical_appearance:This is a photograph of a road in Rijswijk
 Batavia (Jakarta) in Indonesia. There is a wide road in the middle of the photograph. On the right of the road
 there is a fence. The road is lined with trees on either side. On the left
 behind the trees
 there is a building with a canopy front facing the road. The edges of the photograph are rounded. The photograph is slightly faded around the edges. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Rijswijk, Batavia, Java
metadata.materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a road in Rijswijk, Batavia (Jakarta) in Indonesia. There is a wide road in the middle of the photograph. On the right of the road, there is a fence. The road is lined with trees on either side. On the left, behind the trees, there is a building with a canopy front facing the road. The edges of the photograph are rounded. The photograph is slightly faded around the edges. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
